Text:

Thanks uploader!!!
By the way, awesome speed just like the other one... Thanks for that.
Do not delete the original iso wait for the crack. An original is much better than ripped(of course). This one works and you can play but have some bugs.
The instructions say to mount, install, play. So im assuming this is precracked with the minimal files required for a small download although im not sure, downloading now
Yeah you get free MP with every pirated game..... GTFO!

No pirated game includes multiplayer. The main draw of how you fight PC piracy if you are a developer is to create a game that has a compelling MP component. There are some LAN-type hacks for a small handful of games, granted. For the most part, if you want the MP, you gotta buy the game.
The installation fails after about 40%, gonna give it one more try.
It works for me playing right now. Thanks Dibya, and nobody say this is fake because it works for me and Dibya is a reliable torrentor. So if its not working you probably did something wrong.
